Sets the permissions across dribbles based on permissions table

set_permissions.Rd

Sets the permissions of a dribble based on the permissions table. If more than one record is passed unto the dribble, all records will have the same permissions as specified by the permissions_table.

Usage

set_permissions(campaign_name, permissions_table, dribble_files)

Arguments

campaign_name

str Name of the campaign.

permissions_table

tibble A tibble with permissions info. Required columns are: emailAddress and role.

dribble_files

dribble_files A dribble object to assign permissions to.

Value

NULL upon success.

Details

Please see drive_share() for a full explanation on valid roles.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
files <- drive_find()
set_permissions("CAMPAGNE_example", perm_data, files)
} # }
